summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI-Powered Mind ebook application. Backend APIs working well (90% success rate) with minor status code issue. Frontend navigation and basic functionality working but has integration issues for model details and search results display.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns status 200 instead of expected 201 for journal creation
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - functionality works correctly, just wrong status code

ui_bugs.issue: Clicking mental model cards does not navigate to model detail pages
Search input works but returns 0 result elements despite API working
Domain cards don't load with data-testid selectors (found 6 elements but wrong selectors)

integration_issues.issue: Cannot access individual model detail pages to test copyable AI prompts
Backend search API works but frontend doesn't display results

mind_map_issues.issue: Multiple React Flow console errors: 'Couldn't create edge for source handle id: undefined'
mind_map_issues.impact: Mind map displays correctly but edge connections are misconfigured

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and CTAs
Navigation bar with all 4 expected links works
All 6 domain cards display correctly on landing page
Basic page navigation (explore, search, journal, mindmap)
Journal text input and save functionality
Mind map page loads with 79 visualization elements
Conclusion page loads with proper content
Domain page navigation works (shows 80 models for thinking-smarter)
Backend API: Section filtering works (40 models for thinking-smarter)
Backend API: Search returns 3 results for 'inversion'
Backend API: Specific model retrieval works (First Principles Thinking)
Backend API: Journal CRUD operations functional
Backend API: Introduction and conclusion endpoints work
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix model detail page navigation routing - individual mental model cards on domain pages need to properly navigate to /model/{section}/{index} URLs. Fix search results display - search API works but frontend doesn't show results. Fix explore page domain card data loading with proper data-testid selectors. Address React Flow edge configuration in mind map.
